targets.query: select sum(mean) from (SELECT mean(value) FROM "alameda_gpu".."nvidia_gpu_num_devices" where $timeFilter group by host, uuid, time(60s) fill(none)) where $timeFilter group by time(60s)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "alameda_gpu".."nvidia_gpu_duty_cycle" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(none)
select mean(value) * 100 from alameda_gpu..overall_gpu_memory_utilizatin where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(none)
select sum(mean) from (SELECT mean(value) FROM "alameda_gpu".."nvidia_gpu_memory_total_bytes" where $timeFilter group by host, uuid, time(60s) fill(none)) where $timeFilter group by time(60s)

select count from (select count(avg) from (select mean(value) as avg from "alameda_gpu".."nvidia_gpu_duty_cycle" where $timeFilter group by host, time($interval) fill(none)) where avg <= ($gpu_utilization/100) and $timeFilter group by time($interval) )

panels.title: Number of Nodes with Low GPU Cycle Utilization (<$gpu_utilization%)

targets.query: select host, avg from (select last(avg) as avg from (select mean(value)/100 as avg from "alameda_gpu".."nvidia_gpu_duty_cycle" where $timeFilter group by host, time($interval) fill(-1)) where avg <> -0.01 group by host) where $timeFilter and avg < ($gpu_utilization/100)

select count from (select count(avg) from (select mean(value) as avg from "alameda_gpu".."nvidia_gpu_duty_cycle" where $timeFilter group by host, time($interval) fill(none)) where $timeFilter and avg <= ($gpu_utilization/100) group by time($interval) )

panels.title: Number of Nodes with Low GPU Cycle Utilization (<$gpu_utilization%)

targets.query: select count(host) from (select last(value) as value from alameda_gpu..nodes_of_gpu_memory_utilization where $timeFilter group by host) where value <= ($memory_utilization/100)

panels.title: Number of Nodes with Low GPU Memory Utilization (<$memory_utilization%)

targets.query: select host, value from (select last(value) as value from alameda_gpu..nodes_of_gpu_memory_utilization where $timeFilter group by host) where value <= ($memory_utilization/100)

select * from (select count(host) from (select mean(value) as value from alameda_gpu..nodes_of_gpu_memory_utilization where $timeFilter group by host, time(30s)) where $timeFilter and value <= ($memory_utilization/100) group by time(30s))

panels.title: Number of Nodes with Low GPU Memory Utilization (<$memory_utilization%)

targets.query: select count from (select count(avg) from (select mean(value)/100 as avg from "alameda_gpu".."nvidia_gpu_duty_cycle" where $timeFilter group by host, time($interval) fill(none)) where $timeFilter and avg >= ($high_gpu_utilization/100) group by time($interval) )

panels.title: Number of Nodes with High GPU Cycle Utilization (>$high_gpu_utilization%)

targets.query: select last(avg) as avg, time from (select mean(value)/100 as avg from "alameda_gpu".."nvidia_gpu_duty_cycle" where $timeFilter group by host, time($interval)) where $timeFilter and avg > ($high_gpu_utilization/100) group by host

select count from (select count(avg) from (select mean(value)/100 as avg from "alameda_gpu".."nvidia_gpu_duty_cycle" where $timeFilter group by host, time($interval) fill(none)) where $timeFilter and avg >= ($high_gpu_utilization/100) group by time($interval) )

panels.title: Number of Nodes with High GPU Cycle Utilization (>$high_gpu_utilization%)

targets.query: select count(host) from(select last(value) as value from alameda_gpu..nodes_of_gpu_memory_utilization where $timeFilter group by host) where value >= ($high_memory_utilization/100)

panels.title: Number of Nodes with High GPU Memory Utilization (>$high_memory_utilization%)

targets.query: select host, value from (select last(value) as value from alameda_gpu..nodes_of_gpu_memory_utilization where $timeFilter group by host) where value >= ($high_memory_utilization/100)

select * from (select count(host) from (select mean(value) as value from alameda_gpu..nodes_of_gpu_memory_utilization where $timeFilter group by host, time(30s)) where $timeFilter and value >= ($high_memory_utilization/100) group by time(30s))

panels.title: Number of Nodes with High GPU Memory Utilization (>$high_memory_utilization%)

targets.query: select sum("value") from alameda_gpu..gpu_counting_k8s where $timeFilter group by time(5m), "NodeName"  fill(none) order by time desc limit 1

panels.title: Number of GPUs allocated per Node

list.definition: select sum(active) from (select last(value) as active from alameda_gpu..gpu_exporter where value = 1 group by *)
list.name: active
list.query: select sum(active) from (select last(value) as active from alameda_gpu..gpu_exporter where value = 1 group by *)

list.definition: select count(total) from (select last(value) as total from alameda_gpu..gpu_exporter group by *)
list.name: total
list.query: select count(total) from (select last(value) as total from alameda_gpu..gpu_exporter group by *)
